name: Last Man Standing
description:
This is a small game.

After the eighteenth World War.

Human destruction, except you.

Ironically, you're the one who started this war.

Now you have the whole earth, but no one can communicate with you.

You gradually become lonely and indifferent. You can't find people when you wander around the city center, buildings, markets, supermarkets and restaurants.

The world is yours now, but if you don't have friends, relatives and lovers, will you regret your decision?

May the world never have war and peace.

In this game, the only thing players can do is manipulate the characters, browse the scenery, and then experience a lonely life.

Yes, except in a daze, you have nothing to do!

Operation mode

Right click the target

WASD motion control

Mouse control direction
